name: Short Lace Dress
description: Short, straight-cut dress in lace. Opening at back with concealed button at back of neck. Round neck, padded shoulders, and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined. 51% cotton, 25% nylon, 24% rayon. Machine wash cold.

name: V-neck Top
description: Top in woven fabric with V-neck front and back. Narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at back. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: V-neck Top
description: Top in woven fabric with V-neck front and back. Narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at back. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Short Chiffon Dress
description: Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon. Gathers and small ruffle at shoulders, dropped shoulders, and long, wide sleeves with buttons at cuffs. Narrow, elasticized seam at waist and circle skirt with ruffled tiers. Lined. 100% polyester. Machine wash warm.

name: V-neck Top
description: Top in woven fabric with V-neck front and back. Narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at back. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Patterned Slacks
description: Ankle-length slacks in patterned stretch cotton satin. Regular waist with concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with slits at hems. 61% cotton, 36% polyester, 3% spandex. Machine wash...

name: Off-the-shoulder Dress
description: Short, fitted off-the-shoulder dress in stretch ribbed fabric. Short raglan sleeves, seam at waist with gently flared skirt. Unlined. 54% rayon, 44% nylon, 2% spandex. Machine wash warm.

name: Short Chiffon Dress
description: Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon. Gathers and small ruffle at shoulders, dropped shoulders, and long, wide sleeves with buttons at cuffs. Narrow, elasticized seam at waist and circle skirt with ruffled tiers. Lined. 100% polyester. Machine wash warm.

name: Short Dress
description: Short dress in woven fabric. Round neckline and opening at back of neck with a button. Yoke at back with concealed pleats, long sleeves, and narrow cuffs with ties. Side pockets. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Skinny High Waist Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with distressed details. High waist, zip fly with button, and skinny legs. 70% cotton, 28% polyester, 2% spandex. Machine wash...

description: Jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button. Mock pockets at front, regular pockets at back, and super-skinny legs. High waist. 78% cotton, 20% polyester, 2% spandex. Machine wash...

name: Long-sleeved Jersey Top
description: CONSCIOUS. Fitted, long-sleeved top in stretch jersey made from organic cotton with a round neckline. 92% cotton, 3% spandex, 3% rayon, 2% polyester.

name: Oversized Denim Jacket
description: Oversized denim jacket with smooth metal buttons at front and at cuffs. Collar, chest pockets with flap and button, and side-seam pockets. Adjustable tab at back with buttons. 100% cotton. Machine wash cold.

name: Chiffon Dress
description: Short dress in crinkled chiffon with a V-neck front and back. Horizontal ties at back of neck, pleats at top, and concealed side zip. Long, semi-sheer sleeves, gathered seam at waist, and flared skirt. Lined. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Skinny High Waist Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with distressed details. High waist, zip fly with button, and skinny legs. 99% cotton, 1% spandex.

name: Short Sweatshirt

name: V-neck Jumpsuit
description: Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck and short butterfly sleeves. Concealed zip at back, seam at waist, and slightly slimmer, gently flared legs with creases. 92% polyester, 8% spandex. Machine wash warm.

name: Fitted Dress
description: Fitted dress in thick jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves, and cut-out section at back with button at back of neck. Lined at top. 60% rayon, 35% nylon, 5% spandex. Machine wash warm.

name: Short Sweatshirt
description: Short sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbing at neckline, cuffs, and hem. 57% cotton, 43% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Skinny Regular Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in washed superstretch denim with heavily distressed details. Regular waist, zip fly, and slim legs. 82% cotton, 17% polyester, 1% spandex.

description: Joggers in woven fabric with a slight rustle. Wide, elasticized drawstring waistband, side pockets, and a back pocket with zip. Wide jersey ribbing at hems. 54% polyester, 43% cotton, 3% spandex. Machine wash...

name: Knit Mohair-blend Sweater
description: PREMIUM QUALITY. Wide-fitting knit sweater in a mohair blend. Small, ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. 32% nylon, 32% wool, 32% mohair, 4% spandex. Hand wash...

Open chest pockets, side-seam pockets, and high slits at sides. Unlined. 66% polyester, 32% rayon, 2% spandex. Machine wash...
